definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: name of a plant, El Ḥenna (√ dub.; NH [[כּוֹפֶר]]; Aram. [[כּוּפְרָא]], kuwpro0; Ar. El Ḥenna, see Löw:No. 159)—a shrub or low tree, with fragrant whitish flowers growing in clusters like grapes, [[אֶשְׁכּׂל הַכּׂפֶר]] cluster of Ḥenna Ct So 1:14 (fragrant, fig. of a beloved one); pl. [[כְּפָרִים]] Ct So 4:13.
